description: Detects inline windows shell commands redirecting output via the ">" symbol to a suspicious location
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
name: Suspicious CMD Shell Redirect
query: (((process.executable.text:*\\cmd.exe) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"Cmd.Exe")) AND ((process.command_line.text:(*>\ %USERPROFILE%\\* OR *>\ %APPDATA%\\* OR *>\ \\Users\\Public\\* OR *>\ C\:\\Users\\Public\\* OR *>\ %TEMP%\\* OR *>\ %TMP%\\* OR *>\ C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\* OR *>\ C\:\\Temp\\*)) OR ((process.command_line.text:(*\ >\ * OR *\ >>\ *) AND process.command_line.text:*C\:\\Users\\* AND process.command_line.text:*\\AppData\\Local\\*))))
